enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is restricted to Dance Majors/Minors and Music Theatre Certificate Students only.
title: SoC DANCE 130-3-1 Music Theatre Dance II

instructors.instructor_addr: Dance Offices, Marjorie Ward Marshall Dance Center

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Musical Theater Dance II class assumes a basic technical ability in the students taking the class. Class will begin with a thorough warm up; repetition of technical exercises designed to increase stretch, strength and stamina, and increase the confidence level, and so the performance ability of the student. Class will finish with learning longer passages of choreography, in a stylistic survey.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
Quick retention and consistency in performance of learned material
Increased strength, stretch, stamina, coordination, balance, understanding of basic terminology, ability to move in and out of the floor, articulation, alignment, musicality, increased sustained focus and confidence

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value:
Statement of goals in the beginning of quarter.
Midterm video review and assessment of progress, verbal
End of quarter written evaluation based on stated goals and course syllabus, from viewing video collected throughout the quarter.

subject: DANCE
